main event: A glowing white and red light was observed in Tetlersville, Ohio on April 23, 1966.
interesting points: The object was reported to be larger than the largest jet plane and zigzagged from a stationary position at a high rate of speed.
The witness statements were considered conflicting, making it virtually impossible to properly analyze the sighting.
The object appeared to change brightness while being observed.
The object was described as being approximately 2-3 feet in diameter, round or bell-shaped, with a light central section and dark top and bottom portions.
The object hovered about 300 feet off the ground for several minutes before accelerating to an extremely high rate of speed and disappearing.
sighted object: a glowing white and red light
